title: New equipment
fullText:
In Australia, when the equipment is new, the supplier is deemed responsible for its initial electrical safety. New equipment need not be tested, but should be examined for obvious damage. Where deemed compliant, the owner or responsible person should ensure it is tagged in accordance with 2.5.2.1(c).
NOTE â€“ This clause is drawn to the attention of owners of computer and office equipment, who may arrange for the tagging action to be undertaken by their in-house competent person.
